actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: A bill to expedite the completion of Hooker Dam and Reservoir of the Central Arizona project.

summary.text: Sets specific dates for completion of the site selection and environmental impact statements for the Hooker Dam (or alternative) of the Central Arizona project (for New Mexico and Arizona). Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make a record of his decision as soon as practicable after the completion of the final environmental impact statement.

titles.title: A bill to expedite the completion of Hooker Dam and Reservoir of the Central Arizona project.
